data.title: SWLA Arrest Report - August 4, 2024
data.meta_description: The Calcasieu Correctional Center booking report for August 4, 2024.
data.text:
LAKE CHARLES, La. (KPLC) - The Calcasieu Correctional Center booking report for August 4, 2024.

Gary Dale Pierce, 41, DeQuincy: Possession of a controlled dangerous substance, Schedule I; possession of marijuana, 2nd offense; prohibited acts; drug paraphernalia, 2nd offense; possession of synthetic marijuana 1st offense.

Hanna Jade Edwards, 31, Sulphur: Possession of a controlled dangerous substance, Schedule II; prohibited acts; drug paraphernalia; two counts of direct contempt of court.

Edward Louis Zachery, 40, Sulphur: Tail lamps; violations of registration provisions; switched license plate; prohibited acts; drug paraphernalia; possession of a controlled dangerous substance, Schedule II.

Ronalda Rufia Young-Guillory, 39, Sulphur: Two counts of direct contempt of court; prohibited acts; drug paraphernalia; possession of a controlled dangerous substance, Schedule II; contraband defined; certain activities regarding contraband in penal institutions prohibited.

Moses Anthony Figueroa, 30, Lake Charles: Possession of a firearm or carrying concealed weapon by a person convicted of certain felonies; proper equipment required on vehicles.

Dametria Sharon Ladet, 36, Lake Charles: Produce, manufacture, distribute or possess with intent Schedule I Narcotic; produce, manufacture, distribute or possess with intent Schedule II Narcotic; produce, manufacture, distribute or possess with intent Schedule III Narcotic; possession of synthetic marijuana 1st offense; sale, distribution, or possession of legend drug without prescription or order prohibited; exceptions; penalties.

Michael Joseph Lemelle, 56, Westlake: Threatening a public official; penalties; definitions; two counts of direct contempt of court; traffic laws apply to persons riding bicycles; flight from an officer; resisting a police officer with force or violence.

Demarcus Deon Larocca, 28, Lake Charles: Aggravated assault with a firearm.

Gaven Kane Newman, 27, Lake Charles: Domestic abuse battery; pregnant victim.

Charles Alexander Fontenot, 52, Kinder: Aggravated assault with a firearm.

Antonio Jamar Bruno, 28, Lake Charles: Domestic abuse battery; child endangerment; domestic abuse battery; strangulation.

Earl Arthur Miller Jr., 55, Lake Charles: Theft less than $1,000, two or more previous convictions.

Jonathan Joseph Landry, 34, Westlake: First degree rape.

David Jermaine Regan, 44, Westlake: Possession of a controlled dangerous substance, Schedule IV; resisting an officer; possession of alcoholic beverages in motor vehicles.

Gale Eugene Wilson, 51, DeQuincy: Failure to register and notify as a sex offender or child predator.
